```{r}
library("tidyverse")
library("graphclassmate")
```

```{r}
data("speed_ski",package = "graphclassmate")
```

```{r}
skidf <- skidf %>% 
        mutate(gender_event = str_c(sex,event,sep=" "))%>%
        mutate(gender_event = fct_reorder(gender_event,speed))
```

```{r}
saveRDS(skidf,"speed_ski.rds")
```
